title: 419. 68 Ways to Be Better at Life
description: The accidental futurist Kevin Kelly on why enthusiasm beats intelligence, how to really listen, and why the solution to bad technology is more technology.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
